DOC.brief_summary: Objective : The main objective study evaluate efficacy Pascal Laser Iridotomy Pascal Laser Peripheral Iridoplasty lower intraocular pressure open angle patient narrow angle , primary angle closure primary angle closure glaucoma . The specific objective evaluate pain inflammation associate procedure possible adverse effect lens corneal endothelium . Study Design : Prospective , interventional case series Study Population : Healthy male females appositional angle closure age 21 y/o Methods : Potential participant evaluate glaucoma specialist National University Hospital . If identify appositional angle closure invite participate study assign either iridotomy iridoplasty depend mechanism angle closure present . Pupil block Pascal Laser Iridotomy plateau iris angle crowd Pascal Laser Peripheral Iridoplasty . If agree participate undergo visual acuity , slit lamp examination , intraocular pressure determination Goldmann Applanation Tonometry , gonioscopy , optic nerve head evaluation indirect ophthalmoscopy lens evaluation LOCS III opacity grade system . Humphrey visual field examination use 24-2 SITA standard algorithm stereodisc photo obtain do within past 12 month . Anterior segment OCT laser flare meter also perform prior procedure . Enrolled patient divide 2 group . The first group assign Pascal Laser Iridotomy . The primary mechanism angle closure group pupillary block . The second group assign Pascal Laser Peripheral Iridoplasty . This group non-pupil bock mechanism include plateau iris angle crowding . After laser procedure , follow-up examination do 1 hr post laser , 1 week , 1 month , 3 month 6 month . Outcome Measures : The primary outcome measure intraocular pressure difference pre post laser opening angle . Secondary outcome measure pain inflammation associate laser procedure , lens corneal endothelial change .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Evaluation Efficacy Pascal Laser Iridotomy Pascal Laser Peripheral Iridoplasty : A Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: PLANNED INTERVENTIONS Potential study participant see glaucoma specialist National University Hospital . If identify primary angle closure meet inclusion criterion mention , invite participate study . Potential risk benefit explain . After , sign inform consent agree participate . Visual acuity , slit lamp examination , intraocular pressure determination Goldmann Applanation Tonometry , gonioscopy , optic nerve head examination indirect ophthalmoscopy lens evaluation use LOCS III lens opacity grade system do baseline visit . Humphrey visual field exam use 24-2 , SITA standard algorithm stereodisc photo also obtain do within past 12 month . Anterior segment OCT , laser flare meter anterior chamber corneal endothelial cell count also do . Based gonioscopy anterior segment OCT finding , primary mechanism angle closure analyze . Depending major mechanism , assign either Pascal Laser Iridotomy Pascal Laser Peripheral Iridoplasty . Patients identified pupil block assign Pascal Laser Iridotomy identify plateau iris configuration , plateau iris syndrome angle crowding assign Pascal Laser Peripheral Iridoplasty . Post laser follow do 1 week , 1 month , 3 month 6 month . PASCAL LASER IRIDOTOMY Prior laser procedure 1 drop Alphagan-P 4 % Pilocarpine instill 15 minute prior . A. Scanning Laser Parameters 1 . Set pattern mode square array , 2 x 2 spot , 0.25 distance spot . 2 . Set pulse duration 20 m 3 . Adjust spot size 100 um . 4 . Apply spots peripheral iris preferably area 11:00 1:00 o'clock position , position within iris crypt thin iris stroma honeycomb apearance obtain . The desired result appearance small hole dark brown base base burn dispersion debris anterior chamber . B. Penetrating Burn Yag Laser 1 . Set power 2-3 mJ 2 . Apply laser burn center hole mushroom cloud admix aqueous balloon anterior chamber . 3 . Enlarge hole approximately 300 um . C. Lens : Abraham lens PASCAL LASER PERIPHERAL IRIDOPLASTY Prior laser procedure 1 drop Alphagan-P 4 % Pilocarpine instill 15 minute prior . A. Titrate Average Laser Power 1 . Set pattern mode single spot 2 . Set pulse duration 100 m 3 . Adjust spot size 100 um 4 . Apply spots peripheral iris one time increase average power adequate contraction peripheral iris see . B. Scanning Laser Parameters 1 . Choose number row spot ( 2-4 ) depend dose . 2 . Choose spot separation arc -0.25 0.25 spot diameter . One spot diameter = 100 um . 3 . Choose spot space within arc 0 1 spot diameter depend dose . 4 . Set radius arc match curvature peripheral iris . C. Contact lens : CGIL lens Treat 360 degree peripheral iris total 20-24 burn . DEFINITION OF OUTCOMES The main outcome measure difference pre laser post laser intraocular pressure open angle document gonioscopy anterior segment OCT . Secondary outcome measure pain inflammation associate procedure see slit lamp examination grade anterior chamber cell flare laser flare meter analysis , possible change corneal endothelium see specular microscopy . Details Examination Procedures : 1 . Visual Acuity Visual acuity : This assess use logMAR chart standard lighting : best correct visual acuity record ( use subjective refractive correction obtain ) . Subjects start read 6/12 equivalent line ( 0.3 ) unable read least three letter , begin read line continue process least three letter one line read . This line record visual acuity . If subject able read least three letter first line , proceed next line , unable read chart . If unable read chart 4 , subject move 2m , 1m chart . If unable see/achieve minimum recordable logMAR acuity , vision record perception non-perception light . 2 . Goldman Applanation Tonometry The IOP measure Goldman Applanation Tonometry instillation topical anesthetic . The IOP every visit take use slit lamp tonometer . Three consecutive reading take mean three value use statistical analysis . 3 . Slit lamp Biomicroscopic Examination Slit lamp biomicroscopic examination perform slit lamp every visit . Examination conjunctiva , cornea , anterior chamber lens do abnormality note . The lens grade use Lens Opacity Classification Scale III ( LOCS III ) . The anterior cell flare grade follow : A parallelepiped 2 mm wide 4 mm high 45 degree direct pupil . The follow table used9 . Grade Aqueous Cells Grade Flare 0 None 0 Complete absence 1 5-10 cell per field 1 Faint flare ( barely detectable ) 2 10-20 per field 2 Moderate flare ( iris lens detail clear ) 3 20-50 cell per field 3 Marked flare ( iris lens detail hazy ) 4 50 + cell per field 4 Intense flare ( fix , coagulate aqueous humor considerable fibrin ) 4 . Gonioscopy Gonioscopy perform patient use Sussman 4-mirror gonioscopy lens facilitate indentation gonioscopy . Findings quadrant grade use Shaffer System record goniogram . 5 . LOCS III Lens Opacity Grading System LOCS III lens opacity grade system use assess develop cataract increase degree cataract associate laser procedure . It do baseline visit well follow-up visit . 6 . Visual Field Testing Humphrey Visual field Analyzer use program SITA standard , 24-2 test . For visual field reliable , follow criterion follow : fixation loss less 33 % , false positive error le 20 % false negative error le 20 % . Mean deviation pattern standard deviation compare test determine progression disease . 7 . Anterior Segment OCT Anterior segment OCT use Carl Zeiss Visante non-contact imaging system use assess anterior chamber anatomy especially anterior chamber angle . It perform prelaser , 1 week , 1 month , 3 month 6 month post laser . 8 . Flare Meter The Kowa FM-600 Laser flare meter use assess anterior chamber inflammation . Five measurement take average record correct value . Results express photons/ms . 9 . Corneal Specular Microscopy Non-contact specular microscopy perform central peripheral region cornea use Topcon SP-2000P . This method measure state corneal endothelium , parameter determine endothelial cell density , cell area , coefficient variation ( CV ) cell area hexagonality . SCHEDULE OF STUDY VISITS Recruitment visit Baseline assessment do upon referral inclusion study . Treatment Visit Pascal Laser Iridotomy Pascal Laser Peripheral Iridoplasty do . Follow-up Visits Follow-up examination perform 1 week , 1 month , 3 month 6 month laser procedure . The following examination do postlaser visit : visual acuity , slit lamp examination , intraocular pressure determination , lens opacity evaluation , gonioscopy , anterior segment OCT , laser flare meter examination anterior chamber inflammation , Humphrey visual field ( baseline & six month ) corneal endothelial cell count .
DOC.criteria: healthy male females 2 sighted eye age 21 y/o primary angle closure pupil block component plateau iris syndrome plateau iris configuration occludable angle 180 deg uncontrolled IOP ( > 21 mmHg ) able follow able give inform consent advance visual field defect affect 10 degree fixation previous ocular surgery advance corneal edema opacification flat anterior chamber synechially close angle coexist ocular pathology except cataract
